Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class handles the initial setup for the main client side code.
    NetworkSetup
    This class sets up the GUI for the menu option "Networked Game".
    Reversi
    This is the entry point to the program.
    ReversiBoard
    This class captures the row, column, and color of a move and passes it from the model to the view.
    ReversiView
    This is the view class for the Reversi program.
    Server
    This class handles the initial setup for the main server that the game can be ran on.
